name: Legally Blonde: The Game
description:
Welcome to Legally Blonde: The Game!

Solve match-3 puzzles and make all-important narrative choices as you climb the legal ladder and earn your spot at the best law firm!

Meet your idol, make lifelong friends, and overcome your rivals in exciting courtroom battles! Customize your character and appearance, add and try on your favorite clothes, hairstyles, make-up, and accessory options and look the part as you take on the world. Then, renovate your apartment and add that personal touch to your personal space as you start in your humble abode before upsizing and moving into your dream mansion!

SOLVE match-3 levels to beat, with awesome and unique bonus tiles, obstacles, and more!

RENOVATE your apartment and personal space!

DECIDE your fate in the juicy and exciting narrative set in the Legally Blonde world!

CUSTOMISE your look with heaps of character clothing options!  

PERSONALISE your character and have them stand out against the rest!


Legally Blonde: The Game is free to play, with some in-game items purchasable for real money.
